For the dip: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the sausages, heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the sausages and cook for five minutes. Add the honey, soy sauce and sesame seeds and cook, while stirring, for a further three minutes.
For the dip, place the yoghurt and mustard into a clean bowl. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix well.
To serve, place the sausages onto a clean plate with the dip in a bowl in the middle of the plate. Sprinkle the chives over the top of the sausages.
title: Honey, soy and sesame sausages with mustard dip
